summary: This document is a chain of FBI emails from February 2021 discussing coordination to interview a victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The emails involve FBI agents from New York and Denver field offices arranging a meeting time and discussing the victim's request for a trauma-focused therapist.

persons.name: Special Agent - FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: FBI agent from the New York Field Office, Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit, coordinating an interview with an Epstein victim and discussing the victim's need for a trauma-focused therapist.

connections.person1: Special Agent - FBI New York Field Office
connections.description: FBI agents from different field offices (New York and Denver) coordinating on a case involving an Epstein victim.

events.title: Scheduled interview with Epstein victim
events.description: An interview with an Epstein victim is scheduled for 10:30 AM, following coordination between FBI agents.
personsInvolved: Special Agent - FBI New York Field Office

events.title: Initial outreach regarding victim
events.description: FBI agent from New York reaches out to a Denver agent regarding an Epstein victim who has resurfaced and is asking for a trauma-focused therapist.
personsInvolved: Special Agent - FBI New York Field Office

keyFacts: An Epstein victim resurfaced in early 2021 and requested a trauma-focused therapist, prompting FBI coordination.
FBI agents from New York and Denver field offices coordinated to schedule an interview with the victim for February 24, 2021.
The correspondence indicates ongoing FBI investigation and victim support efforts related to the Epstein case years after his death.
